comments_since_last_sample.body: My advice to my fellow brothers: never follow trends just to fit in
Nah man. Bomber jackets will always be a classic and flannel shirts too. How about you just say alternatives to flannels and bomber jackets.  Crazy stuff going on here. Good video though

the problem with this is that I live in New Zealand so everyone is either super casual or just wears serfer and scaiter clothes so most of this isn't plaid out. I have only seen one person ever wear a chelsy boot this year.
